notes: New Directions Aromatics is a well-established Canadian supplier of natural cosmetic ingredients, essential oils, and aromatherapy products. Their postbiotic ferment offerings include various Lactobacillus and Saccharomyces ferment extracts and filtrates, with a focus on natural and organic options. They offer flexible package sizes from small samples perfect for prototyping to bulk quantities for production, making them suitable for manufacturers of all sizes. With international shipping capabilities and competitive pricing, New Directions Aromatics is a reliable choice for natural cosmetics formulators seeking postbiotic ingredients for microbiome-focused formulations.
